341551.「よお！ 俺は<%sL_NPC_NAME>。\n 趣味の考古学者で ピラミッドを:
Hey! The name's Anch! I'm an archeaology hobbyist, and right now I'm checking out what's up with this Pyramid!
As I'm sure you already know, the tombs inside here are pretty dangerous, so it's been hard to investigate them.
Say, you look pretty strong... Maybe I can count on you to investigate the tombs for me?
Wouldja be willing to help me out? I really wanna get a whiff of that ancient air!
I'll regularly give you some requests of what I need you to do for me. If you help me out, I'll reward ya!

341553.「よう！ あんたを 待っていたんだ！\n<br>\n「新しい調査報告書を 用意し:
Hey! Perfect timing!
I've got some new requests for ya, so please give 'em a look!
I'm excited to see what you can find!

341554.「来たか <pc>！\n 俺に 何か用か？\n<select_se_off>\n:
Hey there, <pc>!
What can I do for you?
<select_se_off>
Give Report
View Requests
Exchange Items
Explanation
<select_end>
<case 1><close>
<case 2><break>
<case 3><break>
<case 4><break>
<case_cancel><break>
<case_end>

341555.「他に用はあるか？\n<select_se_off>\n報告をする\n報告書を見:
Anything else?
<select_se_off>
Give Report
View Requests
Exchange Items
Explanation
<select_end>
<case 1><close>
<case 2><break>
<case 3><break>
<case 4><break>
<case_cancel><break>
<case_end>

341556.「わかった やめるんだな。\n じゃあ また 用があれば\n 声をかけてくれよな:
No worries, I understand. Give me a holler
if there's anything you need, alright?

341561.<pipipi_off>\n<pc>は 依頼達成の報酬として\n<%sL_REW:
<pipipi_off>
<pc> received <%sL_REWARD_ITEM>
as a reward for fulfilling the request!
<se_nots System 7>
<end>

341562.<pipipi_off>\n<pc>は 依頼達成の報酬として\n<%sL_REW:
<pipipi_off>
<pc> received <%dL_REWARD_NUM> <%sL_REWARD_ITEM>
as a reward for fulfilling a request!
<se_nots System 7>
<end>

341571.「今のところ もらった報告で\n ピラミッドの論文は 書けそうだ。\n 助かった:
With these reports, I suppose I can write that paper on the Pyramid after all. You really saved my behind there!
I'll have some new requests soon, so I hope you'll be back to help me again.

341572.「何について 聞きたいんだ？\n<select_se_off>\n依頼について\:
What do you wanna know about?
<select_se_off>
About Requests
Completing Requests
Request List Updates
About Rewards
<select_end>
<case 1><break>
<case 2><break>
<case 3><break>
<case 4><break>
<case_cancel><break>
<case_end>
